data.title: Arrive & Depart :: Army Ten
data.text:
Race Day - October 13, 2024 - Pentagon, Washington, D.C.

Before You Arrive

No backpacks or gym bags are allowed at the Army Ten-Miler (ATM). Be sure to review complete security information for the Pentagon and race course before you arrive on race day!

Getting to the ATM Start Line

Parking

No race parking is allowed at the Pentagon. However, runners and spectators may park in one of two nearby parking garages before walking to the Pentagon South Lot:

Fashion Centre at Pentagon City (paid parking)

Opens: 5 a.m.

Entrance locations: 850 Army Navy Drive, Arlington, VA.

and 955 15th Street South, Arlington, VA.

*Located across the street from the Pentagon

Crystal City parking garage (free parking)

Opens: 6 a.m.

Entrance location: 1750 Crystal Drive, Arlington, VA.

*Located a half mileâ€™s walk from the Pentagon

**Information is subject to change based on COVID mitigation measures.

Rideshares and Taxis

If you travel by Lyft, Uber, or taxi, have your driver drop you off at the intersection of 12th and South Hayes Streets in Arlington, VA. (Directly in front of the Fashion Centre at Pentagon City.)

MetrorailPlease click here for METRO advisory for Race Weekend.

Use the Trip Planner function at www.wmata.com to plan your trip to Pentagon Metro Station. Or, follow WMATA on Twitter @Metrorailinfo or @Metrobusinfo, or @wmata. Please confirm your desired station details with www.wmata.com.

Useful Metro Travel Maps:

METRORAIL Color System Map

Road Closures

From 5:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m., all lanes of Route 110 will be closed.

From 7:30 a.m. to 11:30 a.m., the following will experience rolling closures and openings:

Virginia

Click Here to See Arlington County's TRAFFIC ALERT Advisory for exact times and locations.

Army Navy Drive, between the Pentagon City Mall garage entrance and S. Hayes Street (The garage will remain accessible) Key Bridge (Rosslyn)

S. Fern Street, between 12th Street S. and Army Navy Drive

Exit 8C, on southbound I-395

N. Lynn Street

Exit 10A, southbound and on northbound I-395 (Access to the George Washington Memorial Parkway will remain open)

Exit 9, on southbound I-395

Exit 8A, on southbound I-395

Fort Myer Drive, from the Key Bridge to Langston Boulevard

Long Bridge Drive, between 12th Street S and Boundary Channel Drive

Exit 8C, on southbound I-395

Washington, D.C.

Constitution Avenue, NW between 23rd and 18th Streets

Virginia Avenue, NW (all lanes)

Rock Creek Parkway south of Virginia Avenue, NW

Independence Avenue, SW (westbound lanes) from 14th Street to 7th Street

4th Street along Jefferson Drive

14th Street, south I-395 HOV (northbound)

Free Event Shuttle

Spectators can board the free event shuttle, from the Pentagon South Lot to the finish line area, Hooah Tent Zone, and the Reunion Area in the Pentagon North Lot. The shuttle runs continually between 4 a.m. and 1 p.m. Please be prepared for a 10 to minute wait during peak periods. Strollers and wheelchairs are welcome. No backpacks!

Runners should not take the free event shuttle to the North Lot. They will access their start line corrals through the Pentagon South Lot.

THE FINISH LINE ENDS AND OFFICIAL SCORING CLOSES AT 11:30 A.M.

Getting Around Post-Race

Participants and spectators can walk to Garment Check, Metro, and parking garages via Route 110 as directed by volunteers and signage. Those who need additional assistance can take the free event shuttle, to the Pentagon South Lot until 1 p.m. Be prepared for a 10-to-15 minute wait during peak periods. Riders are encouraged to wear masks.
